Preferred Agents Program

As you rise up the rank in levels, the benefits in pricings, credit and delivery terms increases.â€¨Evaluation of level is based on last 12 months total sales order. Free Sample and Free Dispatch credit will be granted base on total sales evaluation in previous calendar year (Jan-Dec). Credit will be provided on 1st January with one year validity. Free Dispatch/Dispatch credit are only applicable in the selected areas below:
